newsitem.title: THAILAND: Thai March wholesale prices up 1.1 pct yr/yr.
newsitem.headline: Thai March wholesale prices up 1.1 pct yr/yr.

text.p: The Thai wholesale price index (WPI) rose 1.1 percent year-on-year in March against a 1.8 percent increase in the previous month, the Commerce Ministry said on Tuesday.
The ministry said wholesale prices rose 0.1 percent in March from February against a 0.5 percent month-on-month decline in the previous month.
The ministry said the 1985-based index rose to 155.3 in March from its 153.6 level in March 1996.
The Thai Commerce Ministry issued the following economic indicators:
THAI WHOLESALE PRICES March 97 Feb 97 March 96
